author: cmlenz
msg: Migration to using JarInputStream instead of JarFile.
This will allow us to read a WAR embedded in an EAR without needing to create a temporary file.

author: cmlenz
msg: Add a 'earfile' attribute (not implemented yet, though)

author: cmlenz
msg: On JDK 1.4 systems, the HttpUnit JAR is also required in the web-app classpath because it might get imported by tests
